description:
Ideal course for a beginner to Photoshop.

Take this course and you will be able to.

  • Produce your own clipart for apps and games.
  • Produce your own clipart for website design.
  • Produce your own style of clipart.
  • Produce your own clipart or logo and own the copyright.


Take this course and you will quickly get up and running with.

  • Setting up the Photoshop workspace and understanding the menus.
  • Use of the tools required to producing clipart.
  • The Pen tool.
  • The Direct Selection tool.
  • The Shape tool.
  • The Paint Bucket tool.
  • Constructing your first clipart.
  • Applying effects such as colours, gradients, stroke, shadow and bevel to the clipart.
  • Saving the clipart and reducing the file size for use in your media.
  • Compositing several images into a single image.

Extras include an underwater clipart scene with a background and several sea creatures (with full psd files).

SEE THE CLIPART IN ACTION - CORAL CANYON game uses some of the clipart supplied in the course.

TAKE THIS COURSE and get started, you will have great fun along the way and a sense of success and achievement at the end.
title: Photoshop the Art of Clipart
